about_the_game: «Kaigrad. Broken Threads» is a long-awaited addition to the storyline with a Herbalist in the village... and not only. DLC will open up the opportunity to look at the world of «Kaigrad» from the other side, meet new characters, spend time with old and beloved heroes, find out the answers to questions and get questions that are worth finding answers to. And, of course, try again to save the world from falling into darkness. We have kept the atmosphere, but upgraded the visual style, as well as added more game mechanics, which will give the passage a completely new emotion.

content_descriptors.notes: Kaigrad contains physical abuse, blood, drug abuse, self-harm, as well as nudity, sexual materials, and a bit of torture.

short_description: «Kaigrad. Broken Threads» is an addition to the visual novel «Kaigrad», which contains a continuation of the story line with the Herbalist in the village... and not only. You are waiting for an updated visual style and game mechanics. New heroes, and the never-ending fight against the dark.
